Pre-Game Insights: Michael Olise receives his first senior call-up for France after helping secure an Olympic silver medal.
Manu Kone could make his debut for France against Italy due to Adrien Rabiot's absence.
Kylian Mbappe is set to win his 85th international cap and needs two more goals to reach 50.
Inter's Marcus Thuram is favored to partner Mbappe in the forward line-up over PSG's Randal Kolo Muani and Antoine Griezmann is on the bench.
